In the given paragraph, "EST" and "GMT" are the only entities that can be identified as organizations. EST stands for Eastern Standard Time, which is a time zone used in the eastern part of North America, while GMT stands for Greenwich Mean Time, which is the time zone that is the basis of Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
